content: **knitted bonbon/sweet/christmas decoration in drops flora and drops glitter the piece is worked from side to side in stocking stitch with stripes and nordic pattern theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsholidayconfection drops design pattern fl-108 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** circumference = 9 cm length = 9 cm **yarn** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 18 red 50 g colour 01 off white and use drops glitter from garnstudio 1 spool colour 01 gold 1 bonbon weighs approx 3 g without wadding **accessories** wadding **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember the needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get to few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
